name: Pharmystery
description:
After purchasing an abandoned pharmacy with the hopes of renovating it into a pleasant country road bar you begin to realise that something disturbing has happened within the walls of this once booming family store. Uncover the mystery behind the sudden disappearance of the previous owner before it’s too late. 

(PLEASE READ HOW TO PLAY SECTION WHEN IN THE MAIN MENU OF GAME)

(This game is an experimental project, I am trying to gain a better understanding of Unity by creating mini projects like this. This is by far not the best work I can produce, I'd like to just keep uploading these small projects to watch my progression over time. Any feedback is much appreciated! )
